title: Big Bar Reaction Ferry
description: Big Bar Reaction Ferry. Travel advisory in effect at Big Bar Reaction Ferry (Big Bar Reaction Ferry). Road closed for the season. The Aerial Car is in operation for foot traffic only. Next update time Fri May 30, 2025. Last updated Tue Nov 19 at 9:13 AM PST. (DBC-70341)
Description: Road closed for the season. The Aerial Car is in operation for foot traffic only.

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Bridge construction at Nicomen River Rd (14 km east of Lytton). Until Sat Nov 30. Watch for traffic control. Expect delays. Speed reduced to 30 km/h. Highway stoppages with expected delays of 15 minutes. Project completion: 30 November 2024. Next update time Fri Nov 29 at 3:00 PM PDT. Last updated Fri Oct 25 at 5:08 AM PDT. (DBC-56391)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions at Nicomen River Rd (14 km east of Lytton)
Description: Bridge construction. Watch for traffic control. Expect delays. Speed reduced to 30 km/h. Highway stoppages with expected delays of 15 minutes.

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Construction work between Coburn St and Shuswap Ave for 0.7 km (Chase). From 7:00 AM to 5:00 PM PDT on weekdays and Saturday. Blasting. Road closed intermittently. Watch for traffic control. Speed reduction to 60km/hr. Next update time Mon Nov 25 at 10:00 AM PDT. Last updated Mon Oct 21 at 10:28 AM PDT. (DBC-64961)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), between Coburn St and Shuswap Ave for 0.7 km (Chase)
Description: Construction work, blasting. Road closed intermittently. Watch for traffic control. Speed reduction to 60km/hr.

title: Highway 1 Both Directions
description: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions. Construction work planned between Old Sicamous Rd and Solsqua-Sicamous Rd for 2.0 km (Sicamous). Starting Mon Nov 25 at 9:00 AM PST. From 9:00 AM to 3:00 PM PST on weekdays and Saturday. Bridge closure planned. Detour planned. Full closure 9AM-3PM Daily and Saturdays. Detour via Highway 97A (Sicamous) / 97B (Salmon Arm.). Next update time Fri Nov 29 at 3:00 PM PST. Last updated Sun Nov 24 at 3:07 PM PST. (DBC-70490)
Location: Highway 1 (TransCanada Highway), in both directions between Old Sicamous Rd and Solsqua-Sicamous Rd for 2.0 km (Sicamous)
Description: Construction work planned. Bridge closure planned. Detour planned. Full closure 9AM-3PM Daily and Saturdays. Detour via Highway 97A (Sicamous) / 97B (Salmon Arm.)

title: Highway 101 Both Directions
description: Highway 101, in both directions. Special event planned between Alberni St and Duncan St for 0.9 km (Powell River). Starting Sun Dec 1 at 2:00 PM PDT until Sun Dec 1 at 5:00 PM PDT. Road closure planned. The annual Santa Claus Parade will be taking place. Next update time Sun Dec 1 at 5:00 PM PDT. Last updated Fri Oct 25 at 12:04 PM PDT. (DBC-69604)
Location: Highway 101, in both directions between Alberni St and Duncan St for 0.9 km (Powell River)
Description: Road closure planned for the annual Santa Claus Parade

title: Highway 17 Both Directions
description: Highway 17 (Patricia Bay Highway), in both directions. Construction work at Exit 18: Keating Cross Rd (Central Saanich). Until Tue Jul 1, 2025. Nighttime lane closures both directions. Access to Barbara Drive from Keating Cross Road and access to East Saanich, Martindale and Danica from Highway 17 permanently closed. Keating Cross Road southbound onramp to Highway 17 closed. Next update time Sat May 10, 2025 at 12:00 PM PDT. Last updated Thu Sep 26 at 12:08 PM PDT. (DBC-54341)

title: Highway 17 Westbound
description: Highway 17, westbound. Bridge construction planned between Bridgeview Dr and Old Yale Rd for 2.5 km (Surrey). Starting Thu Nov 28 until Sat Nov 30. From 9:00 PM to 5:00 AM PST on Thursday, Friday and Saturday. Detour via Bridgeview Dr to 120th St. Next update time Sat Nov 30 at 5:00 AM PST. Last updated Tue Nov 19 at 4:13 PM PST. (DBC-70359)
Location: Highway 17, westbound, between Bridgeview Dr and Old Yale Rd, Surrey

title: Highway 17 Eastbound
description: Highway 17, eastbound. Bridge construction planned between Old Yale Rd and Bridgeview Dr (Surrey). Starting Mon Nov 25 until Wed Nov 27. From 9:00 PM to 5:00 AM PST on Monday, Tuesday and Wednesday. Road closure planned. Watch for traffic control personnel. Detour planned. Drivers to detour at Tannery Rd to 120th St. Next update time Wed Nov 27 at 5:00 AM PST. Last updated Tue Nov 19 at 5:10 PM PST. (DBC-70360)

title: Highway 7 Both Directions
description: Highway 7 (Lougheed Highway), in both directions. There are rocks on the road between 7 Day Adventist Youth Camp Rd and Ross Rd (Hope). Road closed. Assessment in progress. No detour available. Alternate route via Highway 1 and Highway 9. Estimated time of re-opening Wed Nov 27 at 6:00 PM PST. Next update time Wed Nov 27 at 6:00 PM PST. Last updated Mon Nov 18 at 1:02 PM PST. (DBC-70255)

title: Highway 97 Both Directions
description: Highway 97, in both directions. Landslide between Callan Rd and N Beach Rd for 1.5 km (2 to 1 km north of Summerland). Road open to traffic. Expect delays under 5 minutes. Next update time Mon Dec 16 at 12:30 PM PST. Last updated Fri Nov 22 at 12:55 PM PST. (DBC-55794)
Location: Highway 97, between Callan Rd and N Beach Rd, 1.5 km north of Summerland

title: Kootenay Lake Ferry Both Directions
description: Kootenay Lake Ferry, in both directions. Ferry is out of service between Balfour and Kootenay Bay. Schedule modification due to crewing issue. Monday - Friday essential service sailings from Balfour at 6:30AM, 8:10AM, 4:30PM, from Kootenay Bay at 7:10AM, 9AM, 5:20PM. Passage only for essential service travellers. All weekend and holiday sailings cancelled. Emergency service sailings accommodated. Next update time Mon Nov 25 at 9:00 AM PST. Last updated Fri Nov 22 at 3:17 PM PST. (DBC-69872)

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: Soda-Creek Macalister Road, in both directions. Landslide at 10 kms from the Junction of Highway 97. Road closed. Geotech assessment underway. Next update time Fri Feb 21, 2025 at 2:00 PM PDT. Last updated Mon Aug 26 at 2:45 PM PDT. (DBC-16911)
Location: Soda-Creek Macalister Road, in both directions at 10 kms from the Junction of Highway 97

title: Other Roads
description: Kersley-Dale Landing Rd. Landslide at 500 metres in from Highway 97 Intersection. Road closed. A temporary Single Lane Gravel Road for Local Traffic via Arnoldus Road. Next update time Mon Dec 9 at 9:00 AM PDT. Last updated Thu Aug 8 at 9:26 AM PDT. (DBC-23443)
Location: Kersley-Dale Landing Rd. at 500 metres in from Highway 97 Intersection
Description: Landslide, road closed. Temporary Single Lane Gravel Road for Local Traffic via Arnoldus Road.

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: Durrell Road, in both directions. Landslide at 700m from Highway 97. Road closed. Detour in effect. Detour available via Highway 97 and Dale Lake Road. Next update time Wed Apr 23, 2025 at 2:00 PM PDT. Last updated Wed Oct 23 at 1:06 PM PDT. (DBC-27390)
Description: Landslide, road closed. Detour available via Highway 97 and Dale Lake Road.

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: Quesnel-Hixon Road, in both directions. Landslide at Cottonwood bridge. Road closed. Next update time Thu Apr 17, 2025 at 2:00 PM PDT. Last updated Wed Oct 23 at 2:46 PM PDT. (DBC-28386)

title: Other Roads
description: Johnston Bridge. Travel advisory in effect at Front St. In Quesnel. Johnston Bridge. Bridge is open to vehicles with gross vehicle weight rating of 10,000 kilograms or lower. Industrial traffic and heavy commercial traffic must detour via Plywood Rd and Maple Drive. Industrial traffic is not allowed to detour through Johnston Subdivision. Next update time Wed Apr 8, 2026 at 9:00 AM PDT. Last updated Thu Oct 17 at 6:39 AM PDT. (DBC-47311)

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: McKay Road, in both directions. Flooding at McKay Road. Road closed. Next update time Mon Dec 9 at 9:00 AM PDT. Last updated Thu Aug 8 at 9:26 AM PDT. (DBC-53013)
Description: Flooding at McKay Road. Road closed.

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: Canal Rd, in both directions. Construction work at Mt Norman Access Rd. From 10:00 AM to 2:00 PM PST daily. Watch for traffic control. Expect delays. Road closed. Night work will begin on November 13th. Next update time Fri Nov 29 at 10:00 AM PST. Last updated Wed Nov 13 at 9:56 AM PST. (DBC-61149)
Location: Canal Rd, in both directions at Mt Norman Access Rd
Description: Construction work. Watch for traffic control. Expect delays. Road closed. Night work will begin on November 13th.

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: Cave Road, in both directions. Landslide at Quesnel-Hixon Road. Road closed. Landslide on Cave Road. Next update time Tue Apr 1, 2025 at 10:00 AM PDT. Last updated Wed Oct 9 at 10:17 AM PDT. (DBC-67913)

Description: Landslide on Cave Road. Road closed.

title: Other Roads
description: Red Bridge. Bridge closed between Athabasca Street and Lorne Street 1 km north of Kamloops. Bridge damaged. Detour in effect. Detour via Highway 5. Next update time Tue Dec 31 at 12:00 PM PDT. Last updated Fri Oct 25 at 7:55 AM PDT. (DBC-68412)
Location: Red Bridge, 1 km north of Kamloops
Description: Bridge closed between Athabasca Street and Lorne Street due to bridge damage. Detour in effect via Highway 5.

title: Other Roads Both Directions
description: Pavilion Clinton Rd, in both directions. Travel advisory in effect between Clinton and Lillooet 60 km south of Lillooet. Road closed for the season. Pavilion-Clinton Rd is closed for the Winter. Next update time Fri May 16, 2025 at 10:00 AM PST. Last updated Tue Nov 12 at 9:23 AM PST. (DBC-70161)
Location: Pavilion Clinton Rd, in both directions between Clinton and Lillooet 60 km south of Lillooet

title: Upper Arrow Lake Ferry
description: Upper Arrow Lake Ferry. There will be required maintenance between Galena Bay and Shelter Bay. Starting Sat Nov 30 at 10:00 PM PST until Sun Dec 1 at 5:00 AM PST. Ferry will be out of service. Last sailing from Shelter Bay at 9:00PM. Last sailing from Galena Bay at 9:30PM. Next update time Sun Dec 1 at 5:00 AM PST. Last updated Tue Nov 19 at 10:11 AM PST. (DBC-70350)
Description: There will be required maintenance between Galena Bay and Shelter Bay.
